sentence.Network_en: Nail waxing a process that makes your nails shinny.

sentence.Network_en: You can recognize clay because it is very shinny when it is wet.

sentence.Network_en: SURFACTANTS - Aid in helping to keep toilet bowls and urinals stay clean and shinny with every flush.
sentence.Network_cn: 表面活性剂 - 在每次冲厕后,为厕所及小便厕盘带来清洁及闪亮的效果.
